name: Aloha Paradise Hotel
description:
Aloha is a free-to-play holiday resort building game in which you create your individual holiday paradise. Be a hotel manager and develop your hotel to be the most popular holiday destination. Chat and play with lots of other players and send tourists to your friend’s hotel.

Features:

• Build the most beautiful hotel to your individual taste
• Extreme customization flexibility
• Make your tourists happy by building attractions to suit their wishes
• Choose skills to develop your specialized hotel style
• Watch the living hotel simulation with unique tourists
• Chat and play with lots of other players
• Send tourists to your friends hotel
